duties_responsibilities.duty: Build measurement architecture and metrics, developing reporting solutions using statistical analysis and programming languages such as R or Python.
Support the launch of new products and programs for global customers.
Dive deep in data to create insights using Tableau and AWS Quicksight.
Drive business changes and invent new ways to look at data using machine learning models and experimentation.
Partner with Data Engineers and Software Engineers to design products and systems to transform and store billions of data items using SQL, ETL, Data Warehouse solutions, and databases.
Export and analyze data and work with senior leadership to understand customer behaviors, spot system defects, and benchmark our ability to serve our customers.
Develop and maintain standard operating procedures for the business intelligence team and their interactions across the organization.
Lead and manage a team of Business Intelligence engineers and business analysts.
Serve as a senior SME and mentor for SQL and Tableau, including helping teams become more self-sufficient with scripted requests.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Econometrics, Analytics, Computer Science, Operations Research, Engineering, closely related field or equivalent experience
